entries.femaleVariant: [Drink]
OK, this is us, eighth.
She's not here.
[Lean] Mighta managed to flee Dogtown…
[Lean] Maybe Hansen's goons nabbed her.
Gotta talk back-up plan.
It's been, what, twelve hours since the crash? Enough time to flee Dogtown, that's sure.
She'd never leave me behind.
A sleeper agent, no shit? Tell me more. Unless that's, like a... state secret or whatever.
You've seen the swarms Hansen has out huntin'. Mighta nabbed 'er.
So Mi could be dead already. We're wastin' time.
Not a plan – a man. The kind we need.
Solomon Reed's the name.
Reed's a man of principle. He can't be swayed, can't be bribed. If there's anyone we can trust now, it's him.
Could've started with him.
Must be deep undercover.
Seven years under cover? Guy sounds like a true asset.
Used to be with Arasaka once upon a time. Counterintel. Never saw any "Reed" on file.
Reed guy sounds like an ace up your sleeve. Coulda played 'im already.
You'll need a dog whistle.
A what now?
Don't tell him I called it that. It's a signal only Reed will hear – it'll be tricky.
[Take oath] OK, oath it is.
Where's the mystique? Window left ajar?
Secret comms line, presidential token... What's next? A coded message in today's screamsheet?
That token is for your safety.
If Reed isn't one hundred percent certain I sent you, he won't hesitate to kill you.
You're wrong.
I know her, she's a friend. I'm not ready to count her out, let alone sign a death certificate.
There was a secret comms channel, accessed only from a Capitán Caliente nearby. The FIA used it before the war.
Beer? Now?
Booze? This a good time?
Let's see, today I survived a delta crash, a district-wide manhunt and a prototype killer robot…
Yes, it's a great fucking time.
Look what I found.
Whaddaya say? There's more in the fridge.
[Take beer and sit] You got my vote.
Just earned yourself a vote, Madame President.
Are you even registered?
[Sit] Too early to celebrate.
We're stuck in Dogtown with no sign of life from So Mi. Not ready to celebrate yet.
Finally... My legs're killin' me.
C'mon, take a breather.
Still nothing from So Mi?
Songbird – what if she don't show?
Heh. Surreal... All of it.
What's that?
I'd've been home by now.
Reading the evening brief, a glass of water and two sleeping pills waiting on the night table.
Doesn't sound like you miss it much.
Hm.
See you in the morning, V.
She's on the balcony.
A possibility. One that concerns me the most.
Seven years ago he headed up our intelligence efforts in Night City. He and So Mi were a team. With the conflict over, he went into hibernation.
So he's out there somewhere.
Suit yourself. But I won't let a good thing go to waste.
Weapons, now!
What the fuck?!
Myers'll give you more than Hansen ever could or would.
That's the NUS President you're talkin' to. Guarantee the White House can offer more than some hermit warlord.
Lookin' for someone. Asian-American woman, 'bout thirty. Seen anyone like that?
It doesn't ring a bell. But shit, you can't ask her to meet at a bar like a normal choom?
Protocol?
Friendship.
So… what if Songbird don't show?
Then... we'll have one other option to consider.
But let's table it till morning. We should get some rest.
Radio silence.
She's never gone dark this long. Troubling, to say the least.
Expecting more trouble?
Tonight I expect nothing but.
Great place for an ambush.
Housewarming gift from Songbird, maybe?
Above your pay grade, maybe? Consider that?
It is, of the false-bottom drawer variety.
Tell me more.
Let's say you want to secure your interests on another country's soil. If diplomacy fails, you resort to other means.
What's this about airdrops?
Mentioned airdrops before. What's that about?
Maybe I was too busy gettin' my hands wet and dirty.
So that's a "yes." Go back, up your clearance and check again.
No thanks. Never goin' back to 'Saka.
Just might.
So how do I find him?
How do I find your guy? Guessin' I can't just buzz 'im on his work holo, huh?
entries.maleVariant: How do I find your guy? Guessin' I can't just buzz 'im on his work holo.

entries.femaleVariant: Just might. One day.
Ooh, hard pass. Closed chapter in my life.
entries.maleVariant: Hard pass. Closed chapter in my life.

entries.femaleVariant: Night shift, huh?
You pull the night shift?
And an old habit from the Badlands.
Too much.
How do you sleep at night?
Heavy, choom.
You a nomad?
Spring from which I sprung, too.
Badlands… my old stomping ground.
I'll cover you. On three.
One...
Two...
Is this the place...?
Clear!
Pitch fucking black.
Where are you, So Mi?
Seems so… We'll have to sit tight.
[Open]
Oh shit, oh shit!
Good. Although Reed is likely to keep it open.
Why? War's been over seven years.
entries.maleVariant: Why? War's been over for seven years.

entries.femaleVariant: For some, wars never end.
Don't mention it to Reed. I don't need you in a body bag.
Ah, another one with an eternal grudge against Arasaka?
entries.maleVariant: Another one with an eternal grudge against Arasaka?

entries.femaleVariant: Reed has good reasons.
Mornin'. She's on the balcony. Help yourself to some coffee. I made it fresh.
So, you a nomad?
I betrayed them.
I sold my people out to the Raffens. Fourteen family dead in an ambush at Tipton Peak…
Activating a sleeper agent is no simple matter.
They didn't leave me a choice. Whoever they were.
The bodies… we really should do something. I saw a chute in the hallway.
Heard enough?
The access code was... Zero, nine, three, one.
Mhm. So what'll happen next?
Reed will need to screen you.
You'll show him this.
Good news, finally!
Pff, that's tough.
Where's Jacob?
Where's Jacob?
Wait. Wanna try talkin' first.
Big mistake, choom!
[Sit down]
[Get up]
Eh… Wouldn't it be wonderful…
Check this, V – attempt at postmodern art.
Lemme focus.
Hear ya loud and clear – somethin's off.
Old Thorton engine, pretty run down. A little bit of CHOOH left too... If the fuel's not degraded, it could actually run.
Buuut can't start it. Not without a power source.
entries.maleVariant: Buuut, can't start it. Not without a power source.

entries.femaleVariant: [Start generator] Fingers crossed.
Fingers crossed. Here goes…
High time to discuss plan B.
You gotta get outta Dogtown.
[Lean] Could be dead already.
Listen, know we had a calm night, but you gotta leave Dogtown.
How? In a car trunk, fingers crossed? Hansen's waiting for that sort of desperate attempt.
'K, gotta be a way, lemme think… Know my share of fixers. Bet we could get one to--
Out of the question. They'll hand me over to the highest bidder.
This one's taken, clearly!
And amazeballs!
Did what we had to.
Sure, stick to your story.
Deluding yourself come naturally?
Years of practice.
That's two fewer problems down the line. Tough but necessary.
Yes… yes, you're right.
[Remove battery] Oughta do it.
[Link battery]
C'mon… Come to mama…
In ya go.
[Remove battery] Hmm...
Hm, surgical precision.
Hear that? Footsteps.
Songbird?
Maybe... Can't be sure, though.
Welcome to high fuckin' society!
V… We need to eliminate them.
'S our lucky day, choomba. A penthouse with a view of the ci-tay!
Wait! We can talk this out.
Not gettin' outta here alive.
We'll figure somethin' out.
Had a chance to walk away. Shoulda taken it.
C'mon, guys, let's figure somethin' out. We don't want any problems.
Dead men tell no tales.
I think I've had my fill of surprises for one day.
Oughta change out of this mess. High time.
Now whadda we have here…?
Whatever happened, we have to help her.
I need to find her. You don't leave your people behind enemy lines.
Cadets still buy that fairy tale bullshit?
Fuck this…
I won't say it again!
So I see... This the, uh, presidential suite?
Same here. C'mon, V. It's been a helluva long day.
Find cover, go.
I be damned…!
And lights that work. This doesn't feel right…
I hope you know what you're doing.
Yo-yo-yo, chill! Jus' lookin' for a place to hole up for the night.
Feel free. You earned it.
You OK in there?
All good in there?
Yes! I know how to change clothes, V!
Sounds manageable.
No easier way?
Sounds way overcomplicated. Gotta be an easier way.
OK, seems doable.
We'll call the FIA secret agent hotline and dial his extension… No. This is the only way.
And I prefer discretion to destruction. I trust that's clear.
Like, analogue, land-line?
Meanin' an analogue land-line? That crash tear open a hole in space-time?
When sending sensitive information, you use the technology least vulnerable to interception, old or not.
Just because I haven't had to for twelve years…
I hate blackmail.
Aaand… want me a Rayfield!
Uh-huh. Any model in particular?
Shiet, my ass'll fits 'em all the same.
Cocky motherfuckers!
Iron in my face say otherwise!
This "iron" will stay silent so long as you do.
See this junk? Hansen's goons took my 'ganic leg.
Means she's not coming.
New look...? Greeeaaat.
Well you look... like actual trash.
Right? It should draw less attention, too.
Well, when in Rome, right?
Aye aye, Chief Engineer Silverhand. Fuck me…
'S like this – Colonel Hansen runs a big market, but he's landlocked, right? Gotta get his shipments in somehow.
Talkin' iron, ammo, meds, fuckin' anything. All fallin' outta the sky and into Kurt's lap.
Now, if ya know where 'n' when to look… might fall into your lap instead, feel me?
Tellin' me, finders keepers. Kleppin' from Kurt?
entries.maleVariant: Tellin' me, finders keepers? Kleppin' from Kurt?

entries.femaleVariant: 'S kid stuff. Trickle-down economics, I call it.
I was, once upon a time…
Abandon your family?
Which family you in?
None now. I took an exit ramp off the roadie life.
How come?
Well, you asked.
Your own family…? How do you even look yourself in the mirror?
What mirror?
I'm the one who has to live with it.
This is all I got.
I'd rather not get into it.
Fresh airdrop nearby. J went down for a look-see.
Hey, made the right call not takin' that fascist-ass oath.
Y'know, takin' that oath… baaad idea.
Oh yeah?
Some causes are worth pledgin' your life to, V. This ain't one of 'em.
Yeah, yeah. Fuck the system, fuck Arasaka, fuck the NUSA...
Know I was once a corpo jarhead, right? Practically dove into uniform head first.
They had a real hard-on for the oath. "Repeat after me..." blah-di-fuckin' blah.
But… can't remember what I solemnly pledged to do.
Forget it. You were just due a chewin' out.
Gotta hand it to ya, V. Wiser than I was back in the day.
Fuck the system, amirite?
Why do you think that?
How'd you come to that?
'Cause with the biz done, their arm'll still be far up your ass, and you'll be a meat puppet.
Huh. That smoke mean Dogtown chose a new pope?
Well, look who's awake!
Maybe the veep crashed Space Force Two.
Curious as I am, we got an important call to make.
See that crazy colored smoke? Yup, wham-bam, one of Hansen's cargo drops, no doubt.
She all yours. I sure as shit ain't makin' that climb.
Thanks for the tip.
Somethin' wrong?
Don't wanna climb? Or you're not tellin' me somethin'?
entries.maleVariant: Don't wanna climb or... you're not tellin' me somethin'?

entries.femaleVariant: Thanks for the heads-up. Maybe I'll take a look.
Sure thing.
You think I'm finna parkour up on one leg?
It means you work for us. A file will be created for you in the FIA database.
Wait, back up… Tellin' me I'm a special agent now?
That's right. Would taking the oath make it feel more real?
[Take coin] Yeah, no... Let's skip the oath.
Seein' as we're on the same side, can't hurt.
I, V, do hereby solemnly swear...
"I, V, do hereby solemnly swear--"
"...to faithfully serve the New United States of America."
Yeah, nah, let's skip the formal thing.
entries.maleVariant: Yeah, nah. Let's skip the formal thing.

entries.femaleVariant: Is there a problem?
'S just a big commitment, y'know? Can't swear to somethin' I don't believe in.
It's your choice. I understand this was sudden.
Can't rat if you're flatlinin'.
If I do, so do you!
Jesus Christ, V. This ain't some teenage anarchist bootcamp.
Into those dirty rags?
Change... into those filthy, old rags?
These filthy, old rags won't be smeared all over every TV and terminal screen in the city. Unlike my presidential best.
Have a look around. I'll join you in a minute.
Care to join me?
How about it?
Shit…
Word is they a bounty on the head of Rosalind Myers. What we gonna do 'bout that?
You mention Hansen? What was that about?
You negotiated with Hansen? What was that about?
Nuttin'. A small misunderstandin'.
They macheted his leg off.
You motherfuck-- rrrgh…
The White House? But we already in Hansen's house…
If we help each other, I'm prepared to pay double what Hansen would.
Mhm… Aaand what's that s'pose to look like, 'xactly?
Tell me where you want it parked.
Will do... So long as your bodyguard don't slit our throats come nighttime.
Rest easy.
Depends entirely on you.
Rest easy, choom. Just mind your manners.
All depends on you, chooms. Gonna have my eye on ya.
OK, I promise, momma.
I like to celebrate new chooms by tossin' back a few, but T and I gotsta be sharp. Airdrops come mornin', gotta get up early.
You two have a beef with Kurt Hansen?
Mentioned Kurt Hansen. You 'n' him got some kinda beef?
Wanted to start a little side biz, yeah? But I... "forgot" all about the registration fee.
Now I serve as a "warnin' to the rest."
Have a good night?
Sleep OK? Night all right?
Like any with a roof overhead – claustrophobic.
As for Jacob... he thrives in dreamland.
That Caliente should still be wired for it.
Remember – zero - nine - three - one.
[Take coin]
Anyway, you made a wise choice for an overnight. Safe, outta the way... 's even got workin' power.
Why's this building vacant?
Sup, V? Shoot some shit wit' me?
So, one thing I don't get... Building's safe, right? So why's it a total ghost town?
Capitán Caliente – familiar with it?
Supposed to go to the local Capitán Caliente. Know the place?
But it closed down. The business went under and the owner chose the rope.
Our new friends – any thoughts?
How ya feel about our roommates?
None too bright, but not entirely useless.
Another problem solved.
Don't know about you, but I've about had it with today.
Tomorrow will come quickly. I need to rest.
Nuttin' ever does, wid' you, does it? Fuckin' killjoy... You want an angle on Hansen's airdrops, you got it.
C'mon man, le'ss have a look around.
Told ya...
It's best to be prepared for any contingency.
Hopefully no one else thinks so.
Fire it up.
Whoa, pump the brakes, man…
Not now, Tay. I's negotiatin'.
Now tha'ss an idea… But our silence ain't come cheap, yeah?
Live to see another day.
Do you remember negotiating with Hansen, what happened?
Not. Now.
Was a… conflict of interest. Colonel Dipshit don't appreciate motivated entrepreneurs like myself.
Now my question is... What can you offer us that's better?
Live to see another day. Always somethin'.
In Dogtown? Oh boy, lucky me...
Who said anything about Dogtown?
Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours. I have the power to get you out of here. Give you a new city, a new identity. Chance to start over.
Jacob…?
Jesus Christ...
Heh. Only a gonkass fool would spit on an offer like that…
Well, V? Do you plan to slit these two gentlemen's throats?
Not sure I trust this silence, yo?
What V means is she won't harm you as long as you don't give her reason to.
entries.maleVariant: What V means is he won't harm you as long as you don't give him reason to.

entries.femaleVariant: One-time gig.
Every hour brings somethin' new.
I don't work for Myers. Call it a one-time thing.
Then spill it, girl. Workin' for the prez – what's it like? Feds prolly pay stacks, yeah?
entries.maleVariant: Then spill it, mah man. Workin' for the prez – what's it like? Feds prolly pay stacks, yeah?

entries.femaleVariant: Chill, I'm from Heywood.
So you a merc…? Well damn, you hit the jackpot.
Shit, I get it. Not my biz.
Every hour brings new challenges – can't tell you more than that.
Pf, I look like I'm from D.C. to you?
Fuck if I know. Never been.
Nah, I'm Heywood-born and bred.
Dogtown native. No plan to leave neither.
Don't intend to take your shiny, new Rayfield on a cross-country road trip?
entries.maleVariant: Don't intend to take your shiny, new Rayfield for a cross-country road trip?

entries.femaleVariant: Choom, the day I believe a word outta anyone mouth will be my last.
Then why agree to her deal?
'Cause I's an honorable motherfucker, maybe?
Shit, folks gotta live by some kinda code.
Yo, no doubt, no doubt! Hang with the right peeps, I bet the whole world opens it legs.
I, V, do solemnly swear…
Uhh… Never mind.
Know what? Changed my mind. Formalities aren't really my thing.
Hm. I see. They're half my job, so trust me – I get it. Welcome to the FIA.
"...to faithfully serve the New United States of America."
Repeat after me...
Owner have a thing for antiques?
He had a thing for federal money. And he might still be alive.
Heh. It's not my top choice for the hair of the dog.
Well, all-fuckin'-right. We got us a deal.
Likewise... choom.
Do you shit in a storm drain and call it a toilet?
Don't believe me if you want.
Uh-huh... Livin' the dream.
And two extra guns could always prove handy.
"C'mon, baby, ever ridden in a Rayfield?" "…my villa with VIP friends..." "...high society..."
On and on till the crack of dawn.
A man with ambitions, clearly.
Those and a deviated septum.
Like a military coup?
That's one option. Solomon Reed is another, surer one.
Gonna do somethin' about it?
C'mon. It's unlikely to fuckin' explode.
Here? What if more like them show up?
That chute's not goin' anywhere.
Come on.
You serious?
Business trips, lux hotels, joytoys on demand, 'ganic meat, happy hour in orbit – I mean, shit!
Like a fuckin' rock star!
Like a fuckin' rock star...
Sure you wanna talk about this?
There's enough space for four. It should be easy to stay out of each other's way.
But if any uninvited guests arrive, we'll be counting on you to stand with us.
Don't blow this chance.
What's there to consider?
This is your chance. There won't be another.
Seriously? What's there to consider, chooms?
Shit... But it might could be our last...
Chill. Y'know, jus' weighin' the potential pros and cons…
Can you weigh 'em any fuckin' slower?!
You got a deal, Madame Prez.
Finally.
Watch the master and learn, T. Watch 'n' learn.
You're gonna get us killed one of these days.
Maybe. But least you'll kick it with a smile on yo' face and yo' balls in the right place.
Lookin' for a friend of ours. Seen her?
Riiight… Well, tha'ss 'cause it's haunted. But don't worry, baby. You safe wit' me.
entries.maleVariant: Riiight… heh, see, well, tha'ss 'cause it's haunted. You ain't never heard the stories, dawg?

entries.femaleVariant: Jacob...
It's true! Lotta peeps died here. Mysterious circumstances. Like, an aneurysm each and every one.
One time, twelve 'runners they found, all they brains fried. Hansen closed the house down, banned entry.
And the colonel's word mean lots more than some turrets 'n' shit. Folks know to stay away.
So what're we still doin' here?
'Cause fuck him, tha'ss what. And fuck urban legends.
Mh, we could call it my part of our deal.
Back the hell up!
That's better.
You done asked for this!
Gonna look for her myself.
Gotta find her myself, sounds like. On my own.
Not entirely. I have just the person to help.
Huh. Guess we got here first.
Wow, clever plan.
I'm being framed – isn't it obvious? The NUSA's been out for my blood for years.
What transpired in Dogtown is no trivial matter. I urge you all to consider the true motives behind this… spectacle.
Now, I'm not without flaws. But another thing I'm not is suicidal. An attempt on the life of the head of the NUSA?
Will they stop there? No. You, good people of Night City, are next in the fucking line.
The NUSA will take any excuse it can get to send forces into Dogtown.
Mark my words… another war's on its way.
Troglodyte's clever, maybe too clever for his own good.
No one's buyin' that.
Not half-dumb... Jumpin' on the media train, hollerin' war's comin'… and it's all the NUSA's fault.
Bull to the shit. Nobody's buyin' that.
Sow doubt, reap apprehension towards any NUSA attempt to getcha back. Both ends fightin' the middle.
Well, you sure know how to cheer people up…
Oh, they're buying it all right. Reporters even talking to him is the first sign.
Night City's public enemy number one given a full press spread. What a fucking joke.
On behalf of all NUS citizens – I thank you.
Prove 'im wrong, show everybody you're alive.
Best stay put for now, draw no attention.
Gotta let Washington know you're alive, ASAP.
If some mysterious party's out to trigger war, an attempt on my life's a damn good casus belli.
All the more reason for us to stay put. Got plenty of mysteries to solve – Songbird, Washington, Hansen…
Ah, call Washington without knowing who'll answer, friend or foe? Or should I go outside, give Hansen's snipers a big thumbs up?
No, V. Neither's an option.
Classic bluff, nothin' more.
Ah, so, Hansen's decided to wave a classic false flag.
entries.maleVariant: So, Hansen's decided to wave a classic false flag.

entries.femaleVariant: To name a few. Agreed.
Not comfortable here. Place just isn't fully secure.
Can't wait here forever. Place seems safe, but that could change in a flash.
And circling back to Night City, speculative chatter continues tonight around the downed passenger craft.
City officials have yet to release any statement. However, one all too familiar figure did decide to speak out.
Kurt Hansen, the self-proclaimed leader of Dogtown, called a press conference earlier today to offer his take on the situation:
Good luck out there, V. And don't let the bastards nab you.
You lost choom? Last I checked, we're in Dogtown.
Don't tell me it's you two against the town here. One little misstep, 'n' you're scop.
Would you rather die in Dogtown? Or find yourself a nice place across the city line? Your choice.
Cooperation. Ever heard of it?
Chooms, for fuck's sake.
We're all just tryin' to survive here. So cool it, stop talkin' scop and state your price.
One million.
Fine. On one condition. You'll help, lend us miscellaneous support.
Quit yappin', name your price.
Got this hot, itchy feelin' in my groin – like someone's not 'fessed up to somethin'.
Myers hasn't told all, but does she have to?
Songbird's hidin' somethin' – that what you're sayin'?
Mean Myers? Sure, seems the smoke-screen type, but no surprise.
D'ya think she'd start spillin' Washington's dirty little secrets just 'cause I saved her ass?
Hm. Sayin' Songbird didn't give us the full picture?
Our mystery girl. Usually love a bit of hard-to-get, but trust me – rarely ends well.
Well, not like we had time to really chat. Spent most of it runnin'. SF1, run, Chimera, run again…
Really? Gonna sit and nod? Come the fuck on, V.
Politico, Johnny, your words. The prez, no less. The hell you expect?
It's just… Eh, got some questions for the chick. Hope we get a chance to ask 'em.
The more secrets fester in this cesspit sitch, the bigger the shit 'splosion later.
Anyway... Let's get this power sitch sorted.
Though I assume we'd rather not sit in the dark. Power would be useful, we could also get the radio up and running…
What, can't miss our daily dose of fearmongerin'?
We need to know the situation on the ground.
You? Bad vibes? Big surprise...
Makes two of us. Gig's got too many twists and turns.
Sure you'll cook somethin' up.
Songbird – S-tier netrunner, promises a panaceum, a cure-all, then gets wiped off the map.
Myers – shady politico, got a dagger thrown at her back all the way from Washington. Who by and why? Fuck if we know.
Oh, plus Kurt Hansen and his fuckin' SAM launcher. Just preem.
Whole thing seems to run deep.
One thing's sure – plot runs Mariana Trench deep.
We'll cobble together the full picture, piece by piece if needed.
More like rest in pieces, us both.
Gonna give 'em that pay day, really?
Why wouldn't I? They're taking a sizeable risk.
More like a home-cooked generator. Maybe we kick-start it, literally?
Sure. But seein' as we got a lull in the lead pourin' down on us, listen… got a bad vibe about this. You?
Always bad vibes with you… Paranoid much?
Eh, shit... thing needs a little go-go juice to wake up.
One thing at a time, Johnny. A little focus?
Bound to be a battery somewhere in this junkheap.
We need to wait, it's all we can do for now. If she doesn't show, well…
NUS representatives claim President Rosalind Myers was aboard when catastrophe struck.
How about we walk through our sitch real quick instead?
Should do the trick, by my eye...
New look – not bad at all.
You look like trash.
Grab a gulp.
…to faithfully serve the NUSA…
Uh, changed my mind.
I pledge to defend my country against all enemies, foreign and domestic. Should this cause claim my life, so be it.
I pledge to protect my country…
Uh, changed my mind.
I pledge to defend my country against all enemies, foreign and domestic. Should this cause claim my life, so be it.
[Investigate] A generator...?
I vow to uphold the values set forth in the nation's Constitution and represent its government with dignity and due diligence.
I vow to uphold the values set forth in the nation's Constitution and represent its government with dignity and due diligence.
I vow to uphold the values set forth…
Changed my mind.
[Turn on]
